If they come, strike them."},{"lineNumber":155416,"originalJapaneseLine":"「18部隊から22部隊は前に出るよう伝令。","translatedEnglishLine":"Send a message to 18 to 22 units to move forward."},{"lineNumber":155417,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦うのではなく右翼への牽制を旨とさせよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Their task is not to fight but to keep the right flank in check."},{"lineNumber":155418,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それから――」","translatedEnglishLine":"And then—"},{"lineNumber":155419,"originalJapaneseLine":"次から次に現れる新たな指示を、","translatedEnglishLine":"As new army,"},{"lineNumber":155424,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス軍総大将に対する信頼の表れだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"showing the trust placed in him by the General-in-Chief of the Leazas army."},{"lineNumber":155425,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、その前にコルドバの口から、","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, before that, have it come from Cordova himself,"},{"lineNumber":155426,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今、後方で待機している部隊には","translatedEnglishLine":"to tell the units currently waiting in the head."},{"lineNumber":155434,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まだ姿を見せません」","translatedEnglishLine":"She hasn’t shown herself battlefield."},{"lineNumber":155444,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人討伐隊に思いを馳せる。","translatedEnglishLine":"He sent his thoughts to the demon extermination team."},{"lineNumber":155445,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ランス殿……頼みましたぞ……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Lord Rance... I’m counting on you...)"},{"lineNumber":155446,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーっ、さすがに疲れるな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Phew, this is really exhausting."},{"lineNumber":155447,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう連続何戦してたっけか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"How many consecutive battles has it been now...?"},{"lineNumber":155448,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えーと、ひのふの……","translatedEnglishLine":"Uh, hino f no..."},{"lineNumber":155449,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ああ、なんでもいい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, whatever."},{"lineNumber":155450,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シィル、汗」","translatedEnglishLine":"Seer, wipe the sweat."},{"lineNumber":155451,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はーい、汗ふきふき、ふきふき」","translatedEnglishLine":"Okay, wiping the sweat, wiping wiping."},{"lineNumber":155452,"originalJapaneseLine":"「カオスマスター。","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos Master."},{"lineNumber":155453,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうやら向こうに魔物将軍がいるようだぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems like there's a monster general over there."},{"lineNumber":155454,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだと？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What?"},{"lineNumber":155455,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くくく、どうする？　引っ掻き回すか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Heh heh heh, what shall we do? Cause some chaos?"},{"lineNumber":155456,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ワクワクしながら言うんじゃない」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don’t say that like you’re excited."},{"lineNumber":155457,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふむ、どうするかな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, what should we do?"},{"lineNumber":155458,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……まだリーザス軍は押し切れんか」","translatedEnglishLine":"...We still can't break through the Leazas army?"},{"lineNumber":155459,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、そ、そのようで……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Y-Yes, it seems so..."},{"lineNumber":155460,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どいつもこいつも儂への愛が足りん」","translatedEnglishLine":"None of them have enough love for me."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっちに魔物将軍がいるみたいだす！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It looks like there's a monster general over there!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔物将軍か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A monster general, huh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「シルキィちゃんと戦う為に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In order to fight Silky-chan,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 体力は温存するべきだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we should conserve our stamina, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「経験値稼ぎも悪くない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gaining some experience points isn't bad either.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、どうしよう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, what should we do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「バレス将軍、散発的な戦闘が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: General Baresu, sporadic battles are

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各所で行われています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: taking place in various locations.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらが最新の情報です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here is the latest information.
Hmm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スーの示す戦場を上から見下ろした地図を睨む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He glared at the map that Sue showed, looking down at the battlefield from above.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのたった数秒でバレスは結論を出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In just a few seconds, Baresu came to a conclusion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「8部隊から12部隊を退かせよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Withdraw 8 to 12 units.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出来るだけ敵を引き込みたい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to lure the enemy as much as possible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それで相手が止まれば良し、来るなら叩け」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If they stop there, good. If they come, strike them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「18部隊から22部隊は前に出るよう伝令。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Send a message to 18 to 22 units to move forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦うのではなく右翼への牽制を旨とさせよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Their task is not to fight but to keep the right flank in check.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それから――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次から次に現れる新たな指示を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As new orders came one after another,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵達は固唾をのんで聞き頭に叩き込む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the soldiers listened breathlessly and etched them into their minds.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰もバレスの判断に口は挟まない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No one questioned Baresu's decisions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはバレスの統率能力が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because Baresu's leadership ability

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍内で最も優れているという、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is the best within the army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍総大将に対する信頼の表れだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: showing the trust placed in him by the General-in-Chief of the Leazas army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、その前にコルドバの口から、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, before that, have it come from Cordova himself,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、後方で待機している部隊には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to tell the units currently waiting in the rear,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 活を入れるように言ってくれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to urge them to stay active.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「勝つ必要はない、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no need to win,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 守り切り時間が稼げればそれで良い、とな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: just hold the line and buy time, that's all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、確かに伝えます！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, I will definitely convey that!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵は敬礼後、自陣へ矢のように駆けていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After saluting, the soldiers dashed back to our lines like arrows.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「して、魔人シルキィは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, what about the demon Silky...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スーは首を横に振った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sue shook her head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まだ姿を見せません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She hasn’t shown herself yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「苦しい戦いですね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a tough battle, isn't it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、勝つことは出来ん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, we cannot win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃが、無論負けることも出来ん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But, of course, we cannot afford to lose either.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「兵達には苦労を強いるが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s hard on the soldiers...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここを耐え切れねばリーザスは滅ぶ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we can't endure here, Leazas will perish.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんな戦い……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This kind of battle...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早く終われば良いのにのう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wish it would end soon...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレスは地図を睨み、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Baresu glared at the map,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今も戦場のどこかにいる筈の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: thinking of the demon subjugation squad who should still be somewhere on the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人討伐隊に思いを馳せる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He sent his thoughts to the demon extermination team.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ランス殿……頼みましたぞ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Lord Rance... I’m counting on you...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーっ、さすがに疲れるな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Phew, this is really exhausting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう連続何戦してたっけか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How many consecutive battles has it been now...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーと、ひのふの……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uh, hino f no...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、なんでもいい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, whatever.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル、汗」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seer, wipe the sweat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーい、汗ふきふき、ふきふき」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Okay, wiping the sweat, wiping wiping.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カオスマスター。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos Master.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやら向こうに魔物将軍がいるようだぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems like there's a monster general over there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだと？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くくく、どうする？　引っ掻き回すか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh heh heh, what shall we do? Cause some chaos?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ワクワクしながら言うんじゃない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don’t say that like you’re excited.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふむ、どうするかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, what should we do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……まだリーザス軍は押し切れんか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...We still can't break through the Leazas army?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、そ、そのようで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-Yes, it seems so...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どいつもこいつも儂への愛が足りん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: None of them have enough love for me.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっちに魔物将軍がいるみたいだす！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It looks like there's a monster general over there!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔物将軍か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A monster general, huh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「シルキィちゃんと戦う為に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In order to fight Silky-chan,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 体力は温存するべきだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we should conserve our stamina, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「経験値稼ぎも悪くない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gaining some experience points isn't bad either.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、どうしよう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, what should we do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「バレス将軍、散発的な戦闘が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: General Baresu, sporadic battles are

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各所で行われています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: taking place in various locations.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらが最新の情報です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here is the latest information.
Hmm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スーの示す戦場を上から見下ろした地図を睨む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He glared at the map that Sue showed, looking down at the battlefield from above.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのたった数秒でバレスは結論を出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In just a few seconds, Baresu came to a conclusion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「8部隊から12部隊を退かせよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Withdraw 8 to 12 units.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出来るだけ敵を引き込みたい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to lure the enemy as much as possible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それで相手が止まれば良し、来るなら叩け」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If they stop there, good. If they come, strike them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「18部隊から22部隊は前に出るよう伝令。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Send a message to 18 to 22 units to move forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦うのではなく右翼への牽制を旨とさせよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Their task is not to fight but to keep the right flank in check.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それから――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次から次に現れる新たな指示を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As new orders came one after another,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵達は固唾をのんで聞き頭に叩き込む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the soldiers listened breathlessly and etched them into their minds.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰もバレスの判断に口は挟まない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No one questioned Baresu's decisions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはバレスの統率能力が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because Baresu's leadership ability

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍内で最も優れているという、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is the best within the army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍総大将に対する信頼の表れだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: showing the trust placed in him by the General-in-Chief of the Leazas army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、その前にコルドバの口から、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, before that, have it come from Cordova himself,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、後方で待機している部隊には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to tell the units currently waiting in the rear,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 活を入れるように言ってくれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to urge them to stay active.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「勝つ必要はない、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no need to win,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 守り切り時間が稼げればそれで良い、とな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: just hold the line and buy time, that's all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、確かに伝えます！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, I will definitely convey that!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵は敬礼後、自陣へ矢のように駆けていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After saluting, the soldiers dashed back to our lines like arrows.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「して、魔人シルキィは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, what about the demon Silky...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スーは首を横に振った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sue shook her head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まだ姿を見せません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She hasn’t shown herself yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「苦しい戦いですね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a tough battle, isn't it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、勝つことは出来ん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, we cannot win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃが、無論負けることも出来ん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But, of course, we cannot afford to lose either.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「兵達には苦労を強いるが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s hard on the soldiers...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここを耐え切れねばリーザスは滅ぶ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we can't endure here, Leazas will perish.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんな戦い……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This kind of battle...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早く終われば良いのにのう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wish it would end soon...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレスは地図を睨み、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Baresu glared at the map,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今も戦場のどこかにいる筈の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: thinking of the demon subjugation squad who should still be somewhere on the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人討伐隊に思いを馳せる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He sent his thoughts to the demon extermination team.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ランス殿……頼みましたぞ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Lord Rance... I’m counting on you...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーっ、さすがに疲れるな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Phew, this is really exhausting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう連続何戦してたっけか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How many consecutive battles has it been now...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーと、ひのふの……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uh, hino f no...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、なんでもいい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, whatever.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル、汗」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seer, wipe the sweat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーい、汗ふきふき、ふきふき」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Okay, wiping the sweat, wiping wiping.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カオスマスター。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos Master.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやら向こうに魔物将軍がいるようだぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems like there's a monster general over there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだと？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くくく、どうする？　引っ掻き回すか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh heh heh, what shall we do? Cause some chaos?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ワクワクしながら言うんじゃない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don’t say that like you’re excited.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふむ、どうするかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, what should we do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……まだリーザス軍は押し切れんか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...We still can't break through the Leazas army?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、そ、そのようで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-Yes, it seems so...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どいつもこいつも儂への愛が足りん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: None of them have enough love for me.
